# horizontalAlignmentMode

**Instance Property**

The horizontal position of the text within the node.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var horizontalAlignmentMode: SKLabelHorizontalAlignmentMode { get set }
```

```swift
var horizontalAlignmentMode: SKLabelHorizontalAlignmentMode { get set }
```

## Discussion

The possible values for this property are listed in [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKLabelHorizontalAlignmentMode]. The default value of this property is [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKLabelHorizontalAlignmentMode/center].

## Controlling a Label’s Alignment

- **verticalAlignmentMode**: The vertical position of the text within the node.
- **SKLabelVerticalAlignmentMode**: Options for aligning text vertically.
- **SKLabelHorizontalAlignmentMode**: Options for aligning text horizontally.
